body.name: Storkcraft Orchard 5-in-1 Convertible Crib (White with Driftwood) – GREENGUARD Gold Certified, Canopy Style Baby Crib, Converts from Crib to Toddler Bed, Daybed and Full-Size Bed
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 3 hrs 51 mins
features: 5-IN-1 CONVERTIBLE CRIB: Converts from baby crib (mattress sold separately) to toddler bed (toddler guardrail sold separately), daybed, and full-size bed with headboard & optional footboard (conversion kit sold separately); Assembly required

ADAPTS TO YOUR GROWING BABY: Adjustable mattress support base with 3 different height options; Designed to fit any standard full-size crib & toddler mattress; This baby crib may be used until your child can easily climb out or is taller than 35in (89cm)

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED, JPMA CERTIFIED: GREENGUARD Gold Certified products are screened for more than 10,000 chemicals and VOCs known to pollute indoor air; Expert tested to meet or exceed all applicable category voluntary and mandatory safety standards
QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP: Crafted with pine wood, engineered wood, and wood composites; Packaging tested to reduce the risk of incidental damage that could occur during shipment

AWARD-WINNING BRAND: Exclusively from Storkcraft, proud recipient of the 2022 Women’s Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Customer Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture and Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval
body.description: Introducing the Storkcraft Orchard 5-in-1 Convertible Crib, a one-of-a-kind crib that’s full of rustic charm and made to boost your little one’s imagination. Featuring a detachable canopy, the Orchard can easily transform from a beautiful crib into a fun playhouse. The Orchard is made with high-quality pine wood and composites, and is available in 3 non-toxic finishes (White, Driftwood, and Pebble Gray). The Orchard features a 3-position adjustable height mattress support base. Like all Storkcraft cribs, the Orchard is certified by the Juvenile Products Manufacturers Association (JPMA) and is meticulously tested to meet or exceed all applicable safety standards to ensure the safest sleeping environment for your child. Size: Length (57.28 inches); Width (30 inches); Height (60.65 inches); Weight (62.7 pounds)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5-in-1 Convertible Crib Crib This crib is designed to accommodate your growing child. It features a three-positioned adjustable mattress support base. Set the mattress at the middle or highest height for your new born baby. Toddler Bed With or without a safety guardrail, this crib will grow with your child as they transition into a toddler bed. The toddler bed stage is recommended once your child surpasses the height of 35 inches. Safety guardrail is sold separately. Daybed For added versatility, and as your child continues to grow, this crib converts into a daybed. Full Size Bed This crib will last well into adolescence as it converts into a full-size bed with headboard and footboard. Mattress and Graco Full-Size Crib Metal Bed Frame Conversion Kit are sold separately.

Transforms into a Playhouse Designed to adapt to your growing baby, the Storkcraft Orchard 5-in-1 Convertible Crib can convert from a crib into a toddler bed, daybed and full-size bed. It can also transform into a playhouse, making it the perfect choice for sleepovers, playdates and storytime.

Graco Premium Foam Crib and Toddler Mattress Graco Premium Contoured Changing Pad Storkcraft Alpine Changing Table Storkcraft Kenton 6 Drawer Double Dresser Storkcraft Toddler Guardrail Storkcraft Full-Size Metal Bed Frame Crib Conversion Kit Type of Nursery Item Crib and Toddler Mattress Changing Pad Changing Table Dresser Safety Guardrail Crib Conversion Kit Assembled Dimensions (Inches) 52 x 27.6 x 5 32 x 16 x 3 17.99 x 34.72 x 37.8 17.99 x 50 x 32.4 18.5 x 0.75 x 11.5 75.5 x 39.5-60.5 x 12 Weight (Ib) 7 1.46 25.09 100.54 1.45 23 Brief Description The Graco Premium Foam Crib & Toddler Bed Mattress is the ideal recommended firmness for infants, and is designed to fit any standard full-size crib and toddler bed. The Graco Premium Contoured Changing Pad was designed to make changing your baby a clean, safe, and secure process. Our all-new baby changing pad is made of a water-resistant material, that is easy to wipe clean and keep your baby dry. The Storkcraft Alpine Changing Table combines clean lines, modern style, and a universal design that will match perfectly with your baby's nursery. The Storkcraft Kenton 6-Drawer Universal Dresser has an attractive, classic design to bring a touch of elegance to any bedroom or nursery. The Storkcraft Toddler Guardrail is designed to provide added protection during your baby's transition from the crib to the toddler bed. Extend the life of your Storkcraft crib into your not-so-little one’s childhood, teen years, and beyond. This kit will allow you to transform your Storkcraft 4-in-1 or 5-in-1 convertible crib into a full-size bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect versatility for foster parents! Highly recommend for any family!
reviews.reviewText: This crib is gorgeous and so versatile! We are getting licensed to be foster parents and we need furniture that can be suitable for any age 0-8. That can be tricky when you live in a smaller space like ours but this crib is perfect for us. If we need a crib or toddler bed, we’re all set in one and if we have an older child who wants to sleep in a twin, this can easily become a play house and stay in the bedroom. Even if you aren’t fostering, this crib is perfect for all of your child’s transitions. It seems durable enough to convert back and forth as many times as you need so it’s definitely built to last. Standard crib mattress fits perfectly (we got the Graco mattress in a box.)Here are some things I love so far: The crib came well-packaged and well-protected with all parts and hardware marked. There are different sets of screws for the different set ups, so I highly recommend grabbing a few zip lock bags and sorting and labeling each one before you begin. (See pic.) We assembled the crib and changed it to a toddler bed and assembly is great with easy to follow directions! For assembly, it definitely helps to have two people. The pictures in the directions are detailed and show the labels and holes if you need help figuring out the orientation of the pieces. There are also labels that show which side goes down (see pic). For each setup, there will be pieces left over for the other setups so don’t worry that you missed something! Before we purchased the crib, we emailed back and forth with customer service and they are personal, friendly and quick to reply! Answered all our questions and encouraged us to always feel free to reach out for help; that was a big deal to me because my husband and I didn’t know anything about cribs and needed some reassurance. Overall this has been a wonderful experience and we’re so in love 😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and will last a while!
reviews.reviewText: Really love the versatility and the style. Good quality, too. A bit pricier, but will last a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: This crib is exactly what we were expecting. Has a beautiful design, color balance and structure. It's easy to assemble and the instructions manual gives information for all the different possible set ups. Our daughter just loved her new crib, and so do we. I 100% recommend this crib if you like safety, sturdiness and design on the same product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great crib, actually better than what I thought. It was easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The Orchard 5-in-1 convertible crib was easy to unbox and assemble. Instructions were easy to follow and very thorough. The crib itself converts so many ways and is perfect for any nursery or room. We appreciate that the lowest setting and railing is very low so my 19 month old son won’t be able to climb out of it. He’ll be able to use this for so many years!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love the style and how versatile it is. It was easy to assemble, extremely sturdy and definitely worth the money. I would 100% recommend this crib!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous crib, sturdy, easy to assemble, safe sleep space for baby!
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful, well made crib! Easy to assemble with great instructions. Love that it is convertible for many stages in the future. Well made and high quality. I couldn’t be happier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor packaging and strong smell but overall, fine.
reviews.reviewText: The crib itself is nice, big, and generally well constructed. It was easy to assemble and feels very sturdy.However, I have two main problems with the crib.1) The packaging was laughably inadequate. The parts were basically thrown into a box with a couple of small styrofoam pieces. It was admittedly treated roughly by the delivery company, but if it was packaged with some care then there would have been no damage. My crib was dinged in quite a few places, and the joints in one piece had loosened a bit, but was no real problem as it is reinforced by another piece upon construction.2) The crib has a strong chemical smell from the factory! It was rather overwhelming at first, filling any room or hall you put it in. After over a month of airing out in a large hallway, and spending at least a week in the sun, it finally has a reasonable level of odor. You can still smell it if you put your nose right up to the "wood" (melamine covered particle board, or something), but the scent is no longer detectable otherwise.A crib has a lot of parts and assembly, so I can't expect something amazing for ~$300, but I was quite disappointed in the packaging and, most importantly, the smell this crib comes with. I was specifically searching for a crib that didn't smell (it seems to be a rather common problem), but failed. If you have a month or two to air the crib out then it is a good buy.Another minus: I had to drill out two of the holes, as some particle board had broken into them. Another blow to the quality, but for the price range I think it is par for the course, and maybe even fair to expect. So I wasn't really bothered by it.Overall a good crib, though if I could find one that didn't smell for a month I would have purchased that one instead.
